page.title: 06Recent Events
page.content: The School Fete The school fete was an enjoyable day we had a scene of country dancing also a fancy dress competition. this year we raised 1,500 pounds and we brougt a video for the school televison.The members of the PTA where very helpful and worked hard. The children from the school helped put up the stalls and some of the mums and dads stood behind them. Fire at Station In the early days of 1985 Goring station was burnt down by vandals. They now have a little temporary tiket office where people buy their tickets from. The police looked for the vandals but only caught some of them.The tried to get the money out of the safe but they couldnt they were so fustrated that they set fire to the station.
